full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

**Title:** EN321-222369 - External Audit - Solicitation Number: WS3677592327
**Classification:** Audit services (*84111600 - UNSPSC)
**Location:** Ottawa, Quebec, Canada

**Announcement Details:**

* **Publication Date:** October 12, 2022
* **Closing Date:** November 1, 2022, 14:00 Eastern Daylight Time (EDT)
* **Tender Status:** Expiré (Expired)

**Background:**

* The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites Supply Arrangement Holders under the Professional Audit and Support Services (PASS) Supply Arrangement E60ZQ-180001/XXX/ZQ to submit bids for a contract to provide stream 5: External Audit services on an “as and when requested” basis.

**Requirements:**

* The contract will be for a period of one (1) year and up to three (3) option periods of one (1) year each, for a maximum total duration of four (4) years.
* The services required are defined in Annex "A", Statement of Work.
* Bidders must meet the requirements outlined in the Supply Arrangement and have the necessary expertise and resources to provide the required services.

**Important Notes:**

* The closing time for submissions has been modified to November 1, 2022, at 14:00 EDT.
* All bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.
* Bidders are required to submit all required supporting documentation and bid submission by the closing date and time.

**Eligibility:**

* This requirement is open only to Supply Arrangement Holders under the PASS Supply Arrangement E60ZQ-180001/XXX/ZQ.

**Contact Information:**

* Please contact Stephane Beaudry, at stephane.beaudry@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca for any inquiries or clarification.

**Notice URL:**

* The full notice is available on Ariba Discovery [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14273743?extsite=MTQyNzM3NDNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14273743?extsite=MTQyNzM3NDNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

We have followed the original text format and included
